name: AECOM
description: AECOM is a global infrastructure and environmental services firm, providing a broad range of solutions to meet the needs of governments, businesses, and communities around the world. Founded in 1990, AECOM has built a reputation for excellence in engineering, design, construction management, and environmental services. The company operates in more than 150 countries, leveraging its diverse expertise to tackle complex challenges in transportation, water, facilities, environmental remediation, and energy. AECOM is committed to sustainability and resilience, integrating innovative technologies and data-driven solutions to create lasting impacts on the communities it serves. With a focus on delivering projects that improve the quality of life, AECOM's projects range from major transportation infrastructure and urban developments to environmental restoration and disaster recovery efforts. The company emphasizes collaboration and teamwork, working closely with clients and stakeholders to ensure successful project outcomes. AECOM's mission is to build a better world through innovative and sustainable infrastructure solutions.

seo.meta_title: AECOM | Global Infrastructure and Environmental Services
seo.meta_description: Explore AECOM, a global leader in infrastructure and environmental services, dedicated to building a better world through innovative projects and sustainable solutions.

faq.question: What services does AECOM provide?
faq.answer: AECOM provides engineering, construction management, environmental services, and infrastructure solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of AECOM?
faq.answer: T. Christopher Ward is the CEO of AECOM.

faq.question: Where is AECOM headquartered?
faq.answer: AECOM is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.
